titleStmt.title: A true copy of a letter, intercepted, going for Holland directed thus for his, and his wives, never failing friend Roger Le Strange at the Oranges Court with care and speed, hast, hast, post hast.
titleStmt.author: H. B.

notesStmt.note: Signed on page two: H. B.
According to BM the H. B. of this work may be Henry Brome.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
